name: Balance Simulator
description:
Balance Simulator is game made for Mini Jam 34 by Zom'(me) and Mysterious_Dev.

The theme was Balance and we had a limitation : Two buttons controls only.

So in approximatively 1.5 day, we finished it.

Disclaimer : If the game doesn't launch immediately it's because of WebGL so wait and try again and it should work fine ( It may happen when you win or lose )
